body:
![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Copy-of-RR-H01-900-×-506-px-3.png)

__[Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu](https://raiz.com.my/blog/raiz-rewards-jualan-raya-pra-55/)__

__28/04/2023__

__Raiz Rewards: Raya + Pre-5.5 sale!__

__Got your ‘*Duit Raya*’? You may wanna check out these Raya promo & pre-5.5 sale! Add-to-cart, check out,__ and get cash bonus (or cashback) when you shop with our brand partners using “[__Raiz__](http://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)”!  
Your cashback will go into your Raiz account and get invested automatically.

Just go to “[__Raiz Rewards__](http://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)” in your app, search for your favourite brand, and click the “[__Shop Online Here__](http://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)” button. We’ll direct you to the brand’s app/website. Shop like normal, and you will be on your way to get your cashback\*.

So, as you shop, you invest!

*\*Terms & Conditions apply.*

__5.5 Sale!__

__Shopee (+up to 6.37% invested)__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/Shopee-5.5.png)

__5.5 Coins Carnival__

*   __Daily 50%__ coins cashback
*   __Collect & spend coins__ anywhere!
*   Use code __IA55PH__ & get __16% coins cashback__ with a minimum spend of RM60 (capped at 960 coins)

__Lazada (+up to 9.1% invested)__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/Lazada-groceries-sale.png)

__Balik Kampung Season__

*   Up to __40% off__
*   __Fast & free__ shipping
*   __Special vouchers__ from selected categories up for grabs!

__Watsons (+1.47% invested)__

__![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/Watsons-1.png)__

__5.5 Sale__

*   Up to __50% off__
*   __Brands-exclusive rebate__ of up to RM604

__Zalora (+4.2% invested)__

__![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/Zalora-2.png)__

__Zalora Luxury: Designer Week__

*   Up to 60% off
*   Promotion lasts until 1 May 2023

__FWD Takaful (+up to RM105 invested)__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/FWD-Takaful.png)

__FWD Takaful x Raiz__

*   Get 40% discount on the first month’s contribution
*   Promotion lasts until 31 December 2023

[![raiz rewards](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/Explore-Raiz-Rewards.gif)](https://ye77.adj.st/raiz_rewards?adj_t=lwt55og_doqwx9i&adj_deep_link=raiz-my%3A%2F[%E2%80%A6]iz_rewards&adj_fallback=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.raiz.com.my%2Frewards)

raiz rewards

__Need more details?__

Read the FAQ on Raiz Rewards [__here.__](https://raiz.com.my/my-support/)

Want to use Raiz Rewards but don’t have the Raiz App?

Download it for free in the App store or the Webapp [__here.__](https://app.adjust.com/4vnqz2h_q39miv7?fallback=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.raiz.com.my%2Fregistration)
